title: the Minister for Health conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (delegation ministerial functions) order 2025

title: the Minister for Health conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Health conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in 
the Schedule are delegated to Mary Butler, Minister of State at the Department 
of Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [65] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister health conferred enactment specified schedule delegated mary butler minister state department health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 7th march 2025 65 3

title: the Minister for Health conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in
heading: Mental Health Act 2001 (No. 25 of 2001)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Mental Health Act 2001 (No. 25 of 2001) 

Mental Health Act 2008 (No. 19 of 2008) 

Mental Health (Amendment) Act 2018 (No. 10 of 2018) 

Mental Health (Renewal Orders) Act 2018 (No. 23 of 2018) 

Criminal Law (Insanity) Act 2006 (No. 11 of 2006) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 March, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [65]
text_norm: schedule mental health act 2001 (no 25 2001) mental health act 2008 (no 19 2008) mental health (amendment) act 2018 (no 10 2018) mental health (renewal orders) act 2018 (no 23 2018) criminal law (insanity) act 2006 (no 11 2006) given official seal government 4 march 2025 micheal martin taoiseach 4 65

title: the Minister for Health conferred on her by or under the enactments specified in
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2025 delegates to Mary 
Butler, Minister of State at the Department of Health the statutory powers and 
duties of the Minister for Health mentioned in the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [65] 5
